oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aviaries or Musiaries or Revenge on the Rodent
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dingle, Sheldon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Nooo! Not me!! No way! I've neverhad a mouse in my aviary:' How manyof you old-timers believe that B.S. whenyou overhear it at a bird meeting?I confess openly to having hadworld-class experience with rats andmice. I've had aviaries in seven or eightdifferent locations and have never beenwithout resident mice. Rats, on theother hand, have only been a problemonce and I can tell some hair-raisingtales on that subject but I'll reserve themfor another time. This short article willconsider just mice.
